author: bitfliptech
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```
This code ran fine under Windows Powershell 5.1, but not under Powershell Core 6.2.1.

When DefaultParameterSetName and ParameterSetName were lowercase, the errors below are generated.
	[cmdletbinding(defaultparametersetname="raw")]
	param(
        [parameter(mandatory=$False,parametersetname='raw')]
        [parameter(mandatory=$False)][switch]$Raw

Once changed to match the case defined in the docs, the issue was resolved.  
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.management.automation.cmdletbindingattribute?view=pscore-6.2.0

	[cmdletbinding(DefaultParameterSetName="raw")]
	param(
        [parameter(mandatory=$False,ParameterSetName='raw')]
        [parameter(mandatory=$False)][switch]$Raw

```

# Expected behavior

```
No Errors

```

# Actual behavior

```
Property 'defaultparametersetmame' cannot be found for type 'System.Management.Automation.CmdletBindingAttribute'.
At /Users/macuser/work/sophos-api-lib.psm1:61 char:17
+     [cmdletbinding(defaultparametersetmame="raw")]
+                    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (defaultparametersetmame="raw":NamedAttributeArgumentAst) [], RuntimeException
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : PropertyNotFoundForType

and

Property 'parametersetmame' cannot be found for type 'System.Management.Automation.CmdletBindingAttribute'.
At /Users/macuser/work/sophos-api-lib.psm1:63 char:37
+         [parameter(mandatory=$False,parametersetmame='raw')]
+                                     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (parametersetmame='raw':NamedAttributeArgumentAst) [], RuntimeException
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : PropertyNotFoundForType

```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->
```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.1
OS                             Darwin 18.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.6.0: Thu Apr 25 23:16:27 PDT 2019; root:xnu-4903.261.4~2/RELEASE_X86_64
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: From the error it looks like you misspelled `name` as `mame`? :)

title: DefaultParameterSetName and DefaultParameterSetName Case Sensitive
